definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: hover (NH id., cf. Grünbaum:ZMG xxxix (1885), 607; Syr. Pa. rah.ep move gently, also cherish, and brood, cf. Thes:s. v.; connexion with I. ´[[ר]]: dub.);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יְרַחֵף]] [[עַל]] De 32:11 (poem) of vulture hovering over young; Pt. [[מְרַחֶפֶת עַל־פְּנֵי הַמָָּיִם]] ´[[רוּחַ אק]]: Ge 1:2 (P); hovering over face of waters, or perh. (v. Syr.) brooding (and fertilizing), so Jer:Quaest. in Gen. ed. Lag. 4 (reading ‘marahaefeth’), cf. Di Gunk.
